ygData.subject: Re: EVERQUEST HITS SINGAPORE!
ygData.msgSnippet: BEFORE I ANSWER HIS QUESTION : Does any know where to get Shiseido hair products? I ve been looking for the mousse for ^%*$*&$ time. Go to Innoruuk. Gary
ygData.messageBody:
BEFORE I ANSWER HIS QUESTION : Does any know where to get Shiseido hair
products? I've been looking for the mousse for ^%*$*&$ time.

Go to Innoruuk. Gary<nick dunno> and Alex<YiYang> can help you out. Even if
Alex, Gary etc is not on Innoruuk, I'd say its real good due to its lag and
amount of people online during our norm hours.

As for creating a character,
1)Its all based on your roleplaying?
2)Or do you just want to build a "touch-me-and-die" character?

Ans for 2) : Try a Shadowknight Troll/Orge. I personally support the troll.
OR
A magician who does only average but when he hits LvL 45 and
above...
Wheepee! You can kick any PvPs arse in 3 bolts. But if you miss
one
bolt and have no more mana then you are DEAD!

My two cents,
Wilson

----- Original Message -----
From: <leekw13@...>
> Which server got most S'porean kakis? I got my copy yesterday liao, need
to know urgently as I'm starting a new char now.
>
> Any advise when creating char? Thx.
